comment: This is an awesome daily, especially for the price.
Eh? Lot of alcohol burn on the nose and on the palette. Slightly sweet from the rum, and there’s a touch of smoke on the finish that doesn’t last too long

Sweet molasses on the nose that has a mild burn. The molasses is forward and backed by a very light burn and almost nutty flavor that lingers on the palate. Brief mild Smokey finish that disappears almost as soon as it appears .
